text: 7:27 Ofa Gami 9:7; Rom 6:10; Hibru 5:3; 9:12Fomɨra ofa gamir gumazibar dapanir igharaziba, me dughiabar zurara ofabagh ami. Me faragha uan arazir kuraba gɨn amangasa ofabagh ami. Egha gɨn me gumazamizibar arazir kuraba gɨn amangasa ofabagh ami. Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn amir pu. Bar puvatɨ. A dughiar bar vamɨran, e bagha uan mɨkarzim isa ofan mɨn God ganigha egha aremegha gɨfa.
